content: Met with some college friends for coffee. Shared my career setbacks and aspirations. Their support and networking tips are invaluable.
Started researching AI-driven autonomous construction concepts. Could these principles enhance my trading strategies?
The informational interview went well. They're interested in my AI knowledge and my project. Next step: a formal interview.
Reflecting on my trading failures. Realizing I overlooked risk management. Integrating new risk assessment tools into my strategy.
Picked up a new book on machine learning in finance. It's like a treasure trove of ideas for my algorithm.
Received feedback on my trading algorithm from a peer. They suggested improvements in feature selection. Time to refine.
Attended a seminar on AI in finance. Met some industry experts, and one showed interest in my work. Potential collaboration?
Second interview with the quant firm. They're impressed with my knowledge and drive. Now waiting for their decision.
Had an epiphany about risk management while reading about construction AI. Perhaps I can apply predictive models to trading.
Received an offer from the quant firm! A mix of excitement and nervousness. It's time to negotiate terms.
